title: jaya jaya guhA
sahitya:
jaya jaya guhA sharaNam SaNmukhA taruNam IdaiyA panniru kaiyA


anupallavi

  dayai puriya vA sharavaNabhavA
caraNam maravA aDimaik-karuLvAi


caraNam    iraivan unnaiyE paNiyum aDiyEn muraiyiDuvadun uLLamariyumE
Kurai irandiDa pirarai aNugEn kuru_nagai tavazh kumara guruvE
